name: Neon Junk Collector
description:
Please Vote here http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=15

So it's not really a game because it needs menus, a win condition and a LOT of balance work and such but it's something. Spent most of the jam just fighting with tech stuff. Fuuuuuu particles (T_T )
Collect Scrap Balls to stay alive.

Will get a web build uploaded tomorrow, may do a post compo version. For now just a windows build.

CONTROLS

  • Enter to start game
  • Left and Right arrow to aim
  • Press both to shoot
